document.full_text: secretary of state hillary clinton said on tuesday she had discussed ways to extend financial help to the opposition libyan national council but that possible arms transfers were not discussed.
document.title: u.s. looking to provide cash to help libya, not arms
lines_and_colors: secretary of state hillary clinton said on tuesday she had discussed ways to extend financial help to the opposition libyan national council but that possible arms transfers were not discussed.
